item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 3rd October
item.description:
2hr make safe with give and take please make safe with appropriate TM collapsed gully. This was previously made safe with barriers which have been damaged by passing traffic. As such temporary 3 way lights is recommended. (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 3rd October
item.description:
Drains are blocked O/S location. Can't sleep when raining, flood gates, watching all of the time. Insurance builders just finished. Please advise when coming to clear it as they'll need to park their car over the drain so nobody else does
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green or amber traffic light is not working problem, 3rd October
item.description:
Police reporting a car has driven into the traffic lights at this location - are enroute to assess now. These signals are currently switched off due to temp. lights on the road for gas works in North Upton Lane. No details on what damage there is to the traffic lights.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road / cycle path design change, 3rd October
item.description:
Northbound Evesham Road crossroads on A435. Particularly turning right from town centre onto Wellington Road is the issue. As per my photos this used to be two lanes here for left/straight and right. This is now not wide enough for two lanes and if anyone is waiting to turn right vehicles behind cannot pass to go left or straight on. All of this I assume is due to the cycle path changes which is completely unnecessary on this side of the road. My suggestion is either the cycle time on the lights need changing because only two cars got through turning right leaving the D bus behind me waiting for next cycle or a filter right only green light needs adding at the end of the cycle. Clearly a car driver has not tested this change out and has simply only considered the needs of cyclists!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Evesham Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closure sign (5 October) but no information, 3rd October
item.description:
Rosehip Way is a cul-de-sac with many houses/cars. A sign has appeared saying that the road is closed on 5 October. No other information is available. Householders need to know if they will have access for cars etc. This is the 3rd time I have made this request but no one ever replies.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Rosehip Way, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead trees footpath between noverton estate and bouncers lane, 2nd October
item.description:
The footpath running between the noverton estate and bouncers lane has many dead trees and an ash tree that is looking dangerous. Winter is coming and this is a well used footpath with school children, parents and dog walkers, trees could fall and cause injury or damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Ivy Bank, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
